title: Kinder-Gardening
description: Many parents think they can shape their child into a particular kind of adult. Psychologist Alison Gopnik says the science suggests otherwise. She thinks we'd all be better off if we had a different understanding of the relationship between parents and kids.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
